replies.message: I don't even think you know what the illuminati were.  FYI, Tupac did not believe in them in the first place.

what i meant by a satanist is someone who voluntarily or involuntarily worships satan. It seems to me you have a hunch for defending the illuminati and satanists. Tupac did believe in them however he knew that Jesus is Lord. To say he didnt believe in them is the farthest thing from the truth. He exploited them and blew the whistle on them. I am covered by the Blood of Jesus. No weapon that is formed against me shall prosper in Jesus Name. And every tongue raised up in judgment towards me shall be condemned by Jesus in Jesus name. Amen. #(inadvance;)
Kimmy K Luvv , you don't understand what i mean , i love Jesus too, <3
tupac was against the illuminati and tbh people from the illuminati probably killed tupac
time to fuck the illuminati, i hate them, !!! <3 Jesus

@Kimmy K Luvv Satanists don't even worship the devil, much less believe in it.  And no, Tupac did not believe in the illuminati.  You can find an interview he did abut killing the illumnati rumors on Youtube.

Tupac is dead, who gives a fuck what he did and didn't believe, it makes no difference. You're all douchebags and sketchballs, keep calm and go fuckin kill yourselves, I'm out.
